public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateProject(@PathVariable
                                                                                        int id,
                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                        ProjectDTO d)
        Update project's name, description, owner If the project isn't found, return 404 - Not Found If the request doesn't fit the parameters, it returns status 204 - No Content
